import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify'; import { authService } from '../../services/auth'; import Loading from '../common/Loading'; const TouristList = () => { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [statusFilter, setStatusFilter] = useState('All Status'); const [sortBy, setSortBy] = useState('Name (A-Z)'); const [tourists, setTourists] = useState([]); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ total: 156, active: 142, alerts: 3, averageSafety: 87 }); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { loadTouristData(); }, []); const loadTouristData = async () => { try { setLoading(true); // Simulate API call await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1000)); // Mock tourist data matching the police dashboard const mockTourists = [ { id: 'tourist-001', name: 'John Doe', email: 'john.doe@email.com', phone: '+91 98765 43210', destination: 'Rajasthan', location: 'Jaipur City Palace', safetyScore: 67, status: 'Alert', lastSeen: '20m ago', checkIn: '3h ago', alerts: 2, emergencyContact: '+91 87654 32105' }, { id: 'tourist-002', name: 'Jane Smith', email: 'jane.smith@email.com', phone: '+91 87654 32109', destination: 'Kerala', location: 'Munnar Hills', safetyScore: 92, status: 'Safe', lastSeen: '5m ago', checkIn: '1h ago', alerts: 0, emergencyContact: '+91 76543 21098' }, { id: 'tourist-003', name: 'Mike Johnson', email: 'mike.johnson@email.com', phone: '+91 76543 21087', destination: 'Goa', location: 'Calangute Beach', safetyScore: 78, status: 'Caution', lastSeen: '15m ago', checkIn: '2h ago', alerts: 1, emergencyContact: '+91 65432 10987' }, { id: 'tourist-004', name: 'Sarah Wilson', email: 'sarah.wilson@email.com', phone: '+91 65432 10876', destination: 'Delhi', location: 'India Gate', safetyScore: 88, status: 'Safe', lastSeen: '8m ago', checkIn: '30m ago', alerts: 0, emergencyContact: '+91 54321 09876' }, { id: 'tourist-005', name: 'David Brown', email: 'david.brown@email.com', phone: '+91 54321 09865', destination: 'Agra', location: 'Taj Mahal', safetyScore: 90, status: 'Safe', lastSeen: '12m ago', checkIn: '45m ago', alerts: 0, emergencyContact: '+91 43210 98765' }, { id: 'tourist-006', name: 'Lisa Davis', email: 'lisa.davis@email.com', phone: '+91 43210 98754', destination: 'Mumbai', location: 'Gateway of India', safetyScore: 82, status: 'Safe', lastSeen: '25m ago', checkIn: '1.5h ago', alerts: 0, emergencyContact: '+91 32109 87654' } ]; setTourists(mockTourists); } catch (error) { console.error('Error loading tourist data:', error); toast.error('Failed to load tourist data'); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status.toLowerCase()) { case 'safe': return 'success'; case 'alert': return 'danger'; case 'caution': return 'warning'; default: return 'secondary'; } }; const getSafetyScoreColor = (score) => { if (score >= 80) return 'success'; if (score >= 60) return 'warning'; return 'danger'; }; const filteredTourists = tourists.filter(tourist => { const matchesSearch = searchTerm === '' || tourist.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || tourist.id.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || tourist.destination.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || tourist.phone.includes(searchTerm); const matchesStatus = statusFilter === 'All Status' || tourist.status === statusFilter; return matchesSearch && matchesStatus; }); const sortedTourists = [...filteredTourists].sort((a, b) => { switch (sortBy) { case 'Name (A-Z)': return a.name.localeCompare(b.name); case 'Name (Z-A)': return b.name.localeCompare(a.name); case 'Safety Score (High-Low)': return b.safetyScore - a.safetyScore; case 'Safety Score (Low-High)': return a.safetyScore - b.safetyScore; case 'Last Seen': return new Date(a.lastSeen) - new Date(b.lastSeen); default: return 0; } }); const handleAction = (action, tourist) => { switch (action) { case 'details': toast.info(`Viewing details for ${tourist.name}`); break; case 'call': window.open(`tel:${tourist.phone}`); break; case 'message': toast.info(`Sending message to ${tourist.name}`); break; case 'monitor': toast.info(`Enhanced monitoring enabled for ${tourist.name}`); break; default: break; } }; if (loading) { return ; } return (
{/* Header */}

Tourist Management System

Monitor and manage tourist safety across all locations

{/* Statistics Cards */}

{stats.total}

Total Tourists

Filtered Results

{stats.active}

Currently Active

Online

{stats.alerts}

Requiring Attention

Alerts

{stats.averageSafety}

Average Safety Score

Out of 100
{/* Search and Filters */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} />
{/* Results Summary */}
Showing: {sortedTourists.length} of {stats.total}
{/* Tourist Directory */}
Tourist Directory ({sortedTourists.length})
{sortedTourists.map((tourist) => ( ))}
Tourist Information Destination & Location Safety & Status Activity Contact Info Actions
{tourist.name}
{tourist.id}
{tourist.email}
{tourist.destination}
{tourist.location}
{tourist.safetyScore}/100
{tourist.status}
{tourist.alerts > 0 && (
{tourist.alerts} alerts
)}
Last seen:
{tourist.lastSeen}
Check-in:
{tourist.checkIn}
Tourist:
{tourist.phone}
Emergency:
{tourist.emergencyContact}
{sortedTourists.length === 0 && (
No tourists found

Try adjusting your search criteria

)}
); }; export default TouristList;
